card.name: Billing - Duplicate values on pastel file

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @cobuspienaar @jakovanrensburg @lylenutt @sameerkumandan1 

We can add an extra field but it will not replace the Pastel Code as a Company can only have ONE Pastel Code.
We would need to add an extra field for this.

Please ask George to submit a copy of an Invoice stipulating where exactly he wants the change to display taking the above mentioned into consideration.
